name: 布莱恩·丹尼尔·帕特森
name_full: 布莱恩·丹尼尔·帕特森 Brian Daniel Patterson
birth_place: 美国,亚利桑那州,凤凰城
introduction: Brian Patterson was born in Phoenix, Arizona to James and Nancy Patterson. He received a Bachelor of Arts in Theater from Arizona State University. His first professional job was a note-worthy marketing campaign for the new franchised Major League Baseball team, the Arizona Diamondbacks where he worked as the teams "crazy fan" mascot for three years performing in over a dozen local commercials and hundreds of game appearances before making his move to Hollywood in 1999. He has worked extensively with five-time Tony nominee Director Marshall W. Mason and Academy Award-winning screenwriter Horton Foote. Brian has worked professionally in Film, Television and Commercials and is now making his progression into the writing world. He is alumni of the reputable Los Angeles based Writers Boot Camp where he began developing a multitude of screenplays and recently joined the Literary division at Abraxas Talent Management. Brian served as Executive Producer on three Short Films, one of which was honored with multiple awards.
